glsa.title: ImageMagick: Command injection
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in ImageMagick's handling of PDF was discovered possibly allowing code execution.

background.p: A collection of tools and libraries for many image formats.

description.p: A flaw in ImageMagickâ€™s handling of password protected PDFs was discovered.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF using ImageMagick possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.
